channel.title: Musings of an engineer...
channel.description: Recent content on Musings of an engineer...

item.title: Greetings
item.description: Yay another website Yep it’s that time again, that time where I have the spare time to look at my personal website and make a decision about what I want it to be about and what content I want to live on it. I think this is a good start.

item.title: About
item.description: Greetings and Salutations This website is a place to collect my random musings and thoughts. I’ve been a professional software engineer since 2006 and have a breadth of experience in many industries. I pride myself on writing software in a clean and maintainable way. I’m not that big of a blogger so you may not find too many updates to the website but when I feel like it I’ll post things about my interests.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Software Engineering HiveD :: A small game engine built around the Hive board game.
